description.value: Gain +20 to Toughness Tests to resist Heat, Cold, Vacuum, Suffocation, Disease, Poision, and any other Adverse Environmental Conditions that would require a Toughness Test.

system.benefit: Gain +20 to Toughness Tests to resist Heat, Cold, Vacuum, Suffocation, Disease, Poision, and any other Adverse Environmental Conditions that would require a Toughness Test.
